Package src.usr

Class User

Object
User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, MovieGoer
public abstract class User extends Object
An abstract class User representing a user account, holds common features of both admin and moviegoers
Since:
2022-11-13
Version:
1.3
Author:
Jun Xiong
